thread.title: Ruth Lewtschanyn
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Ruth Lewtschanyn

author: Ruth Lewtschanyn
title: Ruth Lewtschanyn
text: My Salesman, Darryl Devers, was so nice and pleasant! Did everything to give me the best deal possible! I absolutely love my new sofa!! The delivery men broke my door jam getting the sofa in my house, but reassured me that there will be somebody out right away to fix it. Thank you for such a great experience!
